page.title: 07Little Chef Restaurant
page.content: This restaurant is one of about{280 {branches}of a{nationwide chain}run by the national company{Trust House {Forte Ltd.}They are{all identical}in many ways: decor, furniture,cooking & customer area layout, menus for adults,children and baby food offering 42 separate items,smart staff uniforms public telephone on site,families with children welcome,childrens high chairs available,no alchohol on sale,all food on sale is fresh and cooked to order. Supplies are sent from a central depot in Hagley,Birmingham.The Hope Little Chef is staffed by 16 girls including 2 managerial staff.It is{open 364 days {a year}from{7.00am_10.00pm.}Waitresses work a 7\hour shift every day.All are specially trained.Company emphasis is {Value for money,civility & smart venue This Little Chef has been open 1 year on the site of a petrol filling stn.
